title: Revolutionizing Logistics: TheCSRUniverse Interview with Ms. Priya Prakash, Co-Founder and Managing Director, Eco ... - The CSR Universe
summary: Eco Life Pallets, a company founded by Priya Prakash, offers sustainable pallet solutions using post-consumer recycled wood and a specialized coating, reducing carbon footprint and promoting environmental consciousness.  These pallets are designed to be more durable and long-lasting than traditional wooden pallets, offering a cost-effective and eco-friendly option for businesses across sectors like pharma, agriculture, and logistics.
